Helmet

Neck guard

The helmet has a mesh front to

protect the face from branches

during landings.

The high collar of the jumpsuit deflects branches around the helmet during tree and brush landings.

Main parachute

The main parachute is carried and

deployed on the back, and will be

one of two systems. Round parachutes for a jump from 1500’, “square” parachutes for a jump from 3000’.

Reserve parachute

If the main parachute fails to deploy a smokejumper uses the reserve parachute.

Personal gear bag

Smokejumpers put personal items like a toothbrush, snacks, and a change of clothing in this bag.

Leg pockets

The right leg pocket carries the

“let-down rope”. The left pocket

carries extras such as a puffy

jacket, or snacks.
